name: PONG (itch) (3emad)
description:
a greenish pong game.

That's it

The sounds were take from coffee bat

https://benjaminno.itch.io/sweet-sounds-sfx-pack

This pack was wonderful and it was satisfying going between sfx to be frank. Not sure if the game will look or sound right...

And the font I used was from ggbot

https://ggbot.itch.io/quinquefive-font

Wonderful font of course. Tbh I was going to go through the pain of making a font I'm very thankful for their incredible work

Controls:-

W/S for the left defender

Up/down arrows for the right one

PAUSE button to pause

ESC to get outfrom the game/go back to main menu?

Would love to hear your opinions!

(It was intended to be a web game but I couldn't understand it)
